title: Betrayal
description: The community members are still recovering from the attack on their community. Dorothy and Harriet are now dead, and most people believe the threats are finally gone, and they can move on with their lives. Unfortunately, Rebecca has other plans and kidnaps several children under the age of seven from the community. Tiffany and Paul believe that she is their biggest threat, but unfortunately, they are very wrong. Will the Dixons and the community ever get a break?
author: Callie Woodridge
